other_tests.findings: Cytologic features that were suspicious for a follicular neoplasm.
Cytologic examination reportedly suspicious for a follicular neoplasm.
Small amount of thyroid tissue on the right side and a new echogenic thyroid nodule on the left side, which displaced the carotid artery.
Left thyroid nodule measured 6 cm in diameter.
Iodine uptake in the midline and the right side of the neck, suggestive of a remnant of thyroid tissue.
Ductal carcinoma in situ and benign ductal hyperplasia.

other_tests.date: Over 5 months following the prior biopsy
other_tests.findings: Ductal carcinoma in situ (grade 2), low-grade phyllodes tumor, hamartoma, atypical ductal hyperplasia, and proliferative fibrocystic changes.
Small hypoechoic region of the left thyroid bed measuring 6 mm, an increase from 3 mm 1.5 years earlier.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased from 3 mm to 6 mm in size.

other_tests.findings: Nonsense mutation, R233X (c.697Câ†’T), in PTEN, diagnostic for the Cowden syndrome.
